## About

Hey, welcome to my website!

Rihad is a Finance post graduate, a results-driven analytics professional and a motivated leader with 2+ years of experience in the data science industry. Who has led various high performing data science projects within the financial domain. Rihad's work range from creating high level business strategy for customer engagement and acquisition to developing Next-Gen cognitive Deep/Machine Learning capabilities aligned to these high level strategies for multiple domains including Renewable Energies. 

Using data to constantly exploring data in real world for meaningful insights, to solve business problems, which drive long-term decisions.
